sentences: Christer Eric Sandelin (born 5 November 1961) is a Swedish singer, songwriter and musician.

In 1978, he was in the Swedish group Freestyle with Tommy Ekman, Joakim Hagleitner, Gigi Hamilton, Diane Söderholm and Anders Uddbergand, and after the break-up of the band in 1983, he continued with Ekman and Hamilton to form the Swedish band trio Style.
In Melodifestivalen 1986 he sang "Dover-Calais" as part of band Style placing 3rd.
He also repeated in Melodifestivalen 1987 with "Hand i hand" again with Style, placing 6th.
The song "Dover-Calais" written by Sandelin and Tommy Ekart and performed by Style was used in soundtrack of 1989 film S/Y Joy (Swedish S/Y Glädjen).
